Package org.apache.archiva.redback.rest.api.services.v2

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultUserService
    @Path("/users")
public interface UserService
    Service interface for user management

      • getUsers

        @Path("")
@GET
@Produces("application/json")
org.apache.archiva.components.rest.model.PagedResult<UserInfo> getUsers​(@QueryParam("q") @DefaultValue("")
                                                                        String searchTerm,
                                                                        @QueryParam("offset") @DefaultValue("0")
                                                                        Integer offset,
                                                                        @QueryParam("limit") @DefaultValue("100")
                                                                        Integer limit,
                                                                        @QueryParam("orderBy") @DefaultValue("id")
                                                                        List<String> orderBy,
                                                                        @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("asc")
                                                                        String order)

      • updateMe

        @Path("me")
@PUT
@Produces("application/json")
UserInfo updateMe​(SelfUserData user)
           throws RedbackServiceException
        Update only the current logged in user and this fields: fullname, email, password. The service verifies the current logged user with the one passed in the method
        Returns:
        the user info object
        Throws:
        RedbackServiceException

      • resetPassword

        @Path("{userId}/password/reset")
@POST
@Produces("application/json")
@Consumes("application/json")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetPassword​(@PathParam("userId")
                                        String userId)
                                 throws RedbackServiceException
        Asks for a password reset of the given User. Normally this results in a password reset email sent to the stored email address for the given user.
        Throws:
        RedbackServiceException

      • getCurrentUserPermissions

        @Path("me/permissions")
@GET
@Produces("application/json")
Collection<Permission> getCurrentUserPermissions()
                                          throws RedbackServiceException
        Returns:
        the current logged user permissions, if no logged user guest permissions are returned
        Throws:
        RedbackServiceException
        Since:
        1.4

                                        throws RedbackServiceException

        the current logged user operations, if no logged user guest operations are returned

        1.4

      • getEffectivelyAssignedRoles

        @Path("{userId}/roles")
@GET
@Produces("application/json")
List<RoleInfo> getEffectivelyAssignedRoles​(@PathParam("userId")
                                           String username)
                                    throws RedbackServiceException
        Returns all roles for a given user id. Recurses all child roles.
        Throws:
        RedbackServiceException
        Since:
        3.0
